column1: Panthera leo persica;Asiatic lion;In the past
column2: Asian lions inhabited all of Europe and Asia. Today they can be found in the wild only in the forest reserve of Gir Forest
column3: in India. They live in forests and areas covered with shrubs. They hunt ungulates
column6: and gazelles. Only about 670 Asiatic lions live in the last natural habitat.;EN;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/15951/115130419
